attributes.action: have the current set of 'Go Compare' adverts taken off of the air.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the public are tired of advertisement companies bombarding us with irritating advertisements. Many members of the public are particularly fed up with the recent set of adverts for the 'Go Compare' company currently being aired. We believe that if enough of the public display their frustration with these adverts then it should be taken off the air.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
